entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:39AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WELL ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES FOR EARLY THIS WEEK... Warm weather with well above normal daytime highs will persist through at least Tuesday for Southeast Alaska.
